title: A Bit of Advice
content: When making decisions we need to be realists and look at every situation and circumstance through a biblical worldview. Now let's not be naive to the realities of what can occur and does occur. We must understand our decisions to be edifying biblically, beneficial (regardless if they think it's beneficial) to those whom our decisions may effect, despite the inconvenience it may cause others or ourselves.

feed.name: Don Qualls
feed.description: To Dare Greatly...this site is about being no longer bound, but to released to God's purposes
